content.title: Pipe Welding
content.body: THW is a leading provider of mechanical engineering services, working predominantly in the food, dairy, EfW and pharmaceutical industries.

content.title: Fabrication
content.body: With a team of talented fabricators, THW can fabricate bespoke components such as seagull tees, swept tees, headers and pipe spools.

content.title: Installation
content.body: THW is fully mobile ready with a team of welders and fitters ready to go anywhere across the UK and EU to weld, fabricate and install on-site.
